title: Complete Hallow Scythe Mythical Sword Guide for Blox Fruits

steps.title: The Hallow Scythe is a Mythical sword.
steps.content: The Hallow Scythe is a Mythical sword. To obtain the Hallow Scythe, you must defeat the Soul Reaper in the Haunted Castle in the Third Sea. There's a 5% chance of getting the Hallow Scythe from the Soul Reaper. [1] X Research source To summon the Soul Reaper, you must either roll a random surprise from the Death King and get the Hallow Essence, or you must pray to the Gravestone NPC at night.

steps.title: The Hallow Scythe has high mobility and is great for grinding.
steps.content: The Hallow Scythe has high mobility and is great for grinding. If you have the Buddha Fruit , the Hallow Scythe is a good sword choice for grinding. Because of how much mobility the sword has, it's good for escaping bounty hunters. However, this sword will be difficult to get for low-level users since it's a low drop rate and has high mastery requirements. If you can't get (or don't want to get) the Cursed Dual Katana , this is a good alternative.

steps.title: Upgrading the Hallow Scythe gives it +8% damage.
steps.content: Upgrading the Hallow Scythe gives it +8% damage. To upgrade the Hallow Scythe, bring 8 Demonic Wisps, 800 Bones, and 25 Scrap Metal to the Blacksmith. The Blacksmith can be found in the Pirate Village (First Sea), Kingdom of Rose (Second Sea), and Port Town (Third Sea).

steps.title: Death Cyclone (Z)
steps.content: Death Cyclone ( Z ) Mastery: 150 Mastery Damage: 4757-5814 Description: You release and orange and black tornado that moves forward from you. The tornado, which has a large hitbox, knocks enemies back and applies tick damage.

steps.title: Soul Execution (X)
steps.content: Soul Execution ( X ) Mastery: 350 Mastery Damage: 4776-6192 Description: You dash forward and grab all enemies along your path, then strike them, which knocks them back and breaks instinct. If the enemy has below 50% health, this move does 1.4x more damage.

steps.title: Pros
steps.content: Pros Good choice for grinding Skills have short cooldowns All moves hit multiple targets Attacks are very fast Has good mobility

steps.title: Cons
steps.content: Cons Attacks are ineffective against Blade Fruit users Difficult to obtain Has high mastery requirements Death Cyclone makes grinding hard due to knockback Soul Execution can be hard to land
